sections.text: Communications between tribunalsA tribunal of this state may communicate with a tribunal outside this state in a record or by telephone, electronic mail, or other means, to obtain information concerning the laws, the legal effect of a judgment, decree, or order of that tribunal, and the status of a proceeding. A tribunal of this state may furnish similar information by similar means to a tribunal outside this state.Acts 1995, No. 251, ยง1, eff. Jan. 1, 1996; Acts 1997, No. 1241, ยง1, eff. July 15, 1997; Acts 2015, No. 80, ยง1, eff. July 1, 2015.
